job_title: New College Grad - IT Software Engineer
job_description:
• You will work in a team of highly skilled software engineers to craft, engineer and implement solutions in a scalable way for a worldwide enterprise.
• Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Computer Engineering or equivalent.
• Effective communication and interpersonal skills Object Oriented Programming preferably.
• NET Motivated to learn new skills independently You will work closely with internal customers and IT teams to drive impactful change.

• Knowledge and experience in verification languages (System Verilog or equivalent) and methodologies (UVM or equivalent) and other scripting languages (python, perl, etc).
• Understand the functionality and timing requirements of the circuitry.
• Strong communication skills with the ability to convey sophisticated technical concepts to other verification peers.
• Bachelor’s degree in Electrical or Computer Engineering and 2+ years of related experience.
• HSPICE, VerilogHDL, FINESIM Bachelor’s degree in Electrical or Computer Engineering or equivalent.
• Master’s degree in Electrical or Computer Engineering Experience with SystemVerilog Assertion (SVA) Good debugging and problem-solving skills.
• Study and learn the circuit design in detail.
• Familiar with analog/digital simulation tools, ie.
